overview: Fu Yu Shu, is a sole child in the rich & powerful family. He's back to Hong Kong after graduation. His girlfriend Bak Shin is also accompanied him to go back home and prepares their wedding too. Yip Hung is his ex-girlfriend in Hong Kong. She likes him for his intellect and wealth. She sedulously dresses up in order to place a visit to his home. While she and her motherarrive at his home, and find that he's alreadygot an intimate girl friend and will soon be married. His attitude is cool and inhospitality. Yip Hung's mother realized it, and then finds an excuse to leave. In order to have a chance to marry him. They ask for the help from Maoshan master to change his mind...
title: Witchcraft Vs Curse
